parameter.name: orderId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Order details for a specific orderId.

parameter.name: systemMessageRemoteId
parameter.description: The System Message Remote Id for generating the Orders Feed for Netsuite.

parameter.name: fromOrderDate
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Order details after specific order date

parameter.name: thruOrderDate
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Order details after specific order date

parameter.name: includeShipmentMethod
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Order details for specific shipment method or a list of shipping method like: POS_COMPLETED,STORE_PICKUP

parameter.name: excludeShipmentMethod
parameter.description: Parameter to exclude the Orders from the specific shipment method or a list of shipping method like: POS_COMPLETED,STORE_PICKUP

parameter.name: includeSalesChannel
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Order details for specific sales channel or a list of sales channel.

parameter.name: excludeSalesChannel
parameter.description: Parameter to exclude the Orders from the specific sales channel or a list of sales channel.

parameter.name: isMixCartOrder
parameter.description: Parameter to include or exclude the orders which have multiple shipping methods. Example: Y to include the order with multiple shipping methods. N to not include the order with multiple shipping methods.

parameter.name: scriptPath
parameter.description: Path to the groovy script which will be used to generate the Feed File.
